UI.Add project directories in Add-on Prefer: Add project directories in Add-on Preferences.
UI.Toggle priority help: Toggle which preferences take priority when both exist. Click 'Reload' to apply.
UI.Project directory help: Configure one or more project directories for .bndl files:
UI.Click + to add first directory: Click + to add your first project directory
UI.Commercial replayer note: For commercial replayer, drop `replayer_pro.py` into bndl_addon/vendor/.
UI.Portable ZIP info: ğŸ“¦ Portable ZIP file - easy to inspect and share
UI.Native Blender info: ğŸ¨ Native Blender format - reliable image packing
UI.Hybrid format info: ğŸ”„ Creates both formats - maximum compatibility
UI.Fallback to proxies: Exports will fall back to PROXIES mode.
UI.Add project directories in Add-on Prefer: Add project directories in Add-on Preferences.
UI.Disable in shared environments to preven: Disable in shared environments to prevent accidental file deletion

Tooltip.Export geometry nodes to .bndl: Export active Geometry Nodes tree to .bndl file format
Tooltip.Export material to .bndl: Export active material's shader nodes to .bndl file format
Tooltip.Export compositor to .bndl: Export scene compositor node tree to .bndl file format
Tooltip.Export both geo and mat: Export both geometry nodes and material for selected object
Tooltip.Apply bndl to selected: Load and apply a .bndl file to selected objects
Tooltip.Apply from library: Apply the selected .bndl from the library to current selection
Tooltip.Refresh file list: Refresh the list of .bndl files from project directories
Tooltip.Open in file manager: Open the export folder in your system's file manager
Tooltip.Clear search filter: Clear the search filter and show all files
Tooltip.Normalize interfaces: Reorganize Geometry Nodes interface items into Groups and Sections based on their display names
Tooltip.Add project directory: Add a new project directory for organizing .bndl files
Tooltip.Validate license key: Validate your BNDL-Pro license key with Gumroad to unlock professional features
Tooltip.Batch export materials: Export multiple materials at once to .bndl files
Tooltip.Batch export selected: Export all selected items (objects/materials/scenes) to .bndl files
Tooltip.Filter by name: Filter .bndl files by name (type to filter - no refresh needed)
Tooltip.Project selection: Select which project directory to export to
Tooltip.Output directory: Where the exporter writes the .bndl file (auto-filled from project selection)
Tooltip.Export notes: Freeform notes stored as ';' comment lines in the .bndl
Tooltip.Pack assets toggle: Automatically create asset packs (.bndlpack or .blend) when exporting .bndl files with image textures
Tooltip.Asset pack format: Format for packing image/video assets alongside .bndl files
Tooltip.Auto-unpack toggle: Automatically load images from .bndlpack or _assets.blend files when replaying .bndl files
Tooltip.Keep replay text: If enabled, the generated BNDL_Replay-*.py Text block will be kept for inspection instead of auto-deleted
Tooltip.Round float precision: Round float numbers in .bndl exports to 3 decimal places. Disable for scientific/manufacturing use cases needing higher precision
Tooltip.Asset dependency mode: How to handle referenced assets (Objects, Materials, etc.)
Tooltip.License email: Your email address (optional, for enterprise/backdoor licenses)
Tooltip.License key: Enter your BNDL-Pro license key to unlock professional features
Tooltip.Prefer user prefs: If enabled, user preferences take priority over studio preferences. If disabled, studio preferences always override user preferences (if studio prefs exist)
Tooltip.BNDL file path: Path to a .bndl file generated by the exporter
Tooltip.Target scene for compositor: Which scene's compositor to replace with the .bndl content
Tooltip.Material slot selection: Which material slot to replace on target objects
Tooltip.Directory: Path to .bndl files for this project
Tooltip.License email: Your email address (optional, for enterprise/backdoor licenses)
Tooltip.License key: Enter your BNDL-Pro license key to unlock professional features
Tooltip.License Validated: Internal flag for license validation status
Tooltip.Allow File Deletion: Allow users to delete .bndl files from the library browser (disable in shared environments)

Property.Name: Name
Property.Path to bndl files: Path to .bndl files for this project

PropertyEnumDesc.None desc: Don't include any asset dependencies - node tree only
PropertyEnumDesc.Proxies desc: Create placeholder (proxy) objects/materials by name (current behavior)
PropertyEnumDesc.Bundle Assets desc: Export referenced assets to matching .blend file and append on import
PropertyEnumDesc.BNDLPACK desc: ZIP file with images + manifest.json - portable, easy to inspect
PropertyEnumDesc.BLEND desc: Minimal .blend file with packed images - native Blender format
PropertyEnumDesc.HYBRID desc: Export both .bndlpack and _assets.blend for maximum compatibility
PropertyEnumDesc.Select Project desc: Choose which project directory to export to
PropertyEnumDesc.All Projects desc: Show .bndl files from all configured project directories

Message.No active tree: No active Geometry Nodes tree found on selected object
Message.No material: No active material on selected object
Message.Select project: Please select a project directory to export to
Message.Invalid license: Invalid license key. Check Console for details
Message.License activated: âœ“ License activated! Pro features unlocked
Message.No file selected: No .bndl file selected in the library
Message.No items to export: No items selected for batch export

Error.Image not found: Image '{name}' not found in blend file
Error.Network error: Network error during license validation. Check your internet connection.
Error.Circular dependency: Circular dependency detected in asset references
